ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR ( AND(TEXT(Career__r.Domain__c) == "Salesforce", TEXT(Domain__c) <> "Salesforce"), AND(TEXT(Career__r.Domain__c) == "Java", TEXT(Domain__c) <> "Java"), AND(TEXT(Career__r.Domain__c) == "DotNet", TEXT(Domain__c) <> "DotNet"), AND(TEXT(Career__r.Domain__c) == "Tech support", TEXT(Domain__c) <> "Tech support"), AND(TEXT(Career__r.Domain__c) == "Testing", TEXT(Domain__c) <> "Testing") )
